title: How to stop Pixel 3a from creating video files when taking still photos?
content: I use camera to record still photos (.jpg + .raw), and I consciously avoid pressing the adjacent video button. However, many many times the resulting photo instead is recorded as a .vid file (with the triangular video icon superimposed onto the image). How do I prevent this unruly behavior, how can I bend Pixel camera to do my will?
